Name: Cyder Press
Ingredients: 60 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Garnish with dehydrated apple slice floated on cocktail.
Review: Fresh, fermented and distilled apple juice with a hint of elderflower.
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Cyder Press contains 212 calories
